## Let's get some Data ...

```{r FirstPlot-1}

library(ggplot2)
library(devtools)

gapminder.url <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/socviz/soc880/master/data/gapminder.csv"
data <- read.csv(url(gapminder.url))
head(data)

```

---

## ... and Plot it

```{r FirstPlot-2, fig.align = "center"}

p <- ggplot(data, aes(x=gdpPercap, y=lifeExp))
p + geom_point()

```
